msg: Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
Collection of low-hanging fruit bug fixes:
* Add backgroundAlpha/backgroundColor style metadata to SkinnableContainerBase and remove it from Panel/Border.
* Add background rect to SkinnableContainerSkin and SkinnableDataContainerSkin.
* Add SkinnableContainerBase selector to spark defaults.css
* BorderSkin – clear the lineStyle before drawing the shadow
* ApplicationBackground – remove flex 4 code. This class is only used with the Halo theme.
* Set DateField cornerRadius to 0 in framework defaults.css
Is noteworthy for integration: Yes - SkinnableContainer/SkinnableDataContainer now support backgroundColor/backgroundAlpha styles.
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
Fix Halo Application backgroundColor style. Also change Halo Application backgroundColor style behavior in Flex 4.

In Flex 4 the backgroundColor style of a Halo Application will be a solid color. To get a gradient color compile the application with -compatibility-version=3 or use the backgroundGradientColors style.
Doc Notes: Please document change in behavior.

Update action script files with asdoc version tags.
Doc Notes: Please review and update as necessary.
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
The beginning of the open-source Flex SDK.
Populated the flex/sdk/trunk directory with an open-source subset of files from //depot/flex/sdk/...@191097 in the Faramir Perforce server. This changelist is a bit past the 3.0rc0 build.
The Ant scripts will not successfully build yet. They need to be adapted to the open-source subset.
